title: Ep 69 | The Coronaboom, Coronavirus Stock Tips, Jesus' Pro-Business Parables & Is Gambling a Sin?
description:
Jase offers up his latest tips for saucing up your sex life AND your DIY stock portfolio (preferably not at the same time). Al shares the story of a guy who missed the mark when he tried to follow Jase's recent romance advice. The guys also discuss the pro-business, pro-capitalist message in the parables of Jesus, and Phil explains why gambling isn't a sin (but might be genetic). Jase wants everyone to know that it's not gambling if you know you're going to win.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
